Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket

Class RemoteServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.RemoteServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server, ViewMethodRequestHandler, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class RemoteServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server, ViewMethodRequestHandler, java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Closeable
    Class that represents a RemoteServer. It also acts as a socket endpoint, handling the requests/responses on the view side.
